modShortDescription: This 7 Days to Die mod changes stack size for some food items, and some resources as follows. Doubled stack size for most ammunition.
modDescription:
This 7 Days to Die mod changes [stack size](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-stack-size/) for some food items, and some resources as follows. Doubled stack size for most ammunition.

* medicalAloe – Stack set to: 100
* medicalBandage – Stack set to: 50
* medicalFirstAidBandage – Stack set to: 20
* medicalFirstAidKit – Stack set to: 10
* ammo9mm – Stack set to: 1000
* ammoShot – Stack set to: 500
* ammoBlunder – Stack set to: 500
* ammoArrow – Stack set to: 500
* ammoCross – Stack set to: 500
* ammoRocket – Stack set to: 40
* foodHoney – Stack set to: 50
* foodCornMeal – Stack set to: 1000
* foodCropBlueberries – Stack set to: 1000
* foodCropMushrooms – Stack set to: 1000
* drinkJarBoiledWater – Stack set to: 50
* drinkJarYuccaJuice – Stack set to: 50
* drinkJarGoldenRodTea – Stack set to: 50
* drinkJarRedTea – Stack set to: 50
* drinkYuccaJuiceSmoothie – Stack set to: 50
* drinkJarCoffee – Stack set to: 50
* resourceCrop – Stack set to: 1000
* resourceFeather – Stack set to: 500
* resourceArrowHead – Stack set to: 500
* resourceGunPowder – Stack set to: 1000
* resourceBuckshot – Stack set to: 500
* resourceBullet – Stack set to: 1000
* resourceRepairKit – Stack set to: 100
* resourceOil – Stack set to: 100
* resourceFishingWeight – Stack set to: 1000
* resourceSilverNugget – Stack set to: 500

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/DelStryker/Delmod/tree/master/Delmod_Stack_Sizes)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/11141-del-stryker-a17-modlet-collection/).

**Credits:** [Del Stryker](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/del-stryker/)
